descripcion_es: Fecha y hora en que el encuestado respondió el formulario.

original_name: What industry do you work in?
descripcion_es: Industria en la que trabaja el encuestado.

original_name: If your job title needs additional context, please clarify here:
descripcion_es: Texto libre con contexto adicional sobre el cargo.

original_name: What is your annual salary? (You'll indicate the currency in a later question. If you are part-time or hourly, please enter an annualized equivalent -- what you would earn if you worked the job 40 hours a week, 52 weeks a year.)
How much additional monetary compensation do you get, if any (for example, bonuses or overtime in an average year)? Please only include monetary compensation here, not the value of benefits.
descripcion_es: Compensación monetaria adicional anual reportada (sin estandarizar).

original_name: If "Other," please indicate the currency here:
descripcion_es: Texto libre cuando la moneda es 'Other'.

original_name: If your income needs additional context, please provide it here:
descripcion_es: Texto libre con contexto adicional sobre ingresos.

original_name: What country do you work in?
If you're in the U.S., what state do you work in?
What city do you work in?
How many years of professional work experience do you have overall?
How many years of professional work experience do you have in your field?
descripcion_es: Años de experiencia en el campo (rango).

original_name: What is your highest level of education completed?
What is your race? (Choose all that apply.)
